snippet: The St. Louis Blues lost their last six games and allowed the Colorado Avalanche to clinch the division on a tiebreaker.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Detroit Red Wings beat St Louis Blues, 3-0; other hockey news noted.
lead_paragraph: The St. Louis Blues lost their last six games and allowed the Colorado Avalanche to clinch the division on a tiebreaker.

headline.main: Colorado Clinches Central; Tampa Bay Wins Home Ice
headline.print_headline: Colorado Clinches Central; Tampa Bay Wins Home Ice
